name: Wordsearch machine Lite
description:
Crank out and solve unlimited word search puzzles with the high-performance engine of WordSearch Machine! You will never see the same puzzle twice! This app produces a fresh puzzle every time, along with a related, mystery key sentence as an added bonus once the puzzle is completely solved.

Snappy response and clean, uncluttered board graphics have been designed for your iOS device, specifically the iPhone and iPod Touch. Word selection is super easy with either one swipe or a couple taps. WordSearch Machine lite is limited to one theme and two grid sizes but full version lets you choose from among 8 themes and 4 grid sizes. Additionally, several attractive fonts are available to make the game even more pleasing to the eye!

If you get stuck, the useful Help Me button flashes at the start of a new word to give a friendly hint! WordSearch Machine is the perfect game for the whole family to enjoy!

Lite version Features:
- Built-in word search generator with fun key sentence to solve upon puzzle completion
- 2 grid sizes (8x8, 9x9)
- 2 different methods to mark the words as found
- 4 attractive fonts from which to choose
- Help me button for giving a little hint when you can’t find a word
- Automatic save of unfinished grid so you can continue later where you left off
- Retina Display support
- Updated FAQ online with your inquiries so you can share insight from others
- Scores page showing your points as well as those earned for each grid solved
- Statistics page showing all details of your game (including Help-me used, Grid size, Words count, Missing words, and more detailed notes)

Full version Features:
- 8 popular and interesting subject themes (Animals, Countries, Classical Mythology, Flowers and Plants, just to name a few)
- 4 grid sizes (8x8, 9x9, 10x10 and 11x11) to accommodate your requirements
- Game center with leaderboard of the best puzzle solvers.
